name: Tron (itch) (Itizso)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.7a Details Title Tron Series Tomytronic Manufacturer TOMY Co., Ltd. Release Date 1982 Screen Vacuum Fluorescent Display ( VFD ) Chipset Hitachi HD38800 ( 400 kHz ) Description

TRON is a color tabletop electronic game released in 1982 by the Japanese toy company TOMY based on the Disney movie.

Gameplay

The object of the game is to destroy the Master Control Program (MCP) by completing three distinct stages, each based on a different action sequence from the original movie.

  • Level 1 - Light Cycle Game
    In the first stage you must move Tron's light cycle around the Game Grid to cut off the enemy. When you manage to destroy three enemy light cycles you will advance to the next stage.

  • Level 2 - Ring Game
    In the second stage, Tron and Sark throw discs at each other in the hope that either of them will miss catching it. When you manage to make Sark miss 4 discs you will move on to the next stage.

  • Level 3 - MCP Game
    In the third game, you will need to perfectly time throwing a disc so it bypasses the protective barrier of the MCP to destroy it once and for all.

Once all three stages have been completed, the cycle starts again but at a faster speed for a higher degree of difficulty.
